languages.text: "Слухи о присутствии на корабле Лорд-капитана Теодоры ходят давно и напоминают скорее провокацию, чем болтовню обычных пьяниц. Возможно, кто-то намеренно возбуждает массы восстать против вас, или же это влияние варпа. Блюстители уже проводит расследование, но прямо сейчас нужно остановить разгорающийся конфликт — пока волнения продолжаются, щиты корабля не будут работать в полную мощность".

traits.locale_text: "Слухи о присутствии на корабле Лорда-капитана Теодоры ходят давно и напоминают, скорее, провокацию, чем болтовню обычных пьяниц. Возможно, кто-то намеренно возбуждает массы восстать против вас, или же это влияние варпа. Служба безопасности уже проводит расследование, но прямо сейчас нужно остановить разгорающийся конфликт — пока волнения продолжаются, щиты корабля не будут работать в полную мощность".

languages.text: "Rumours of Lady Theodora's presence on the voidship have been circulating for a long time and appear to be a deliberate provocation rather than ordinary drunken ramblings. Perhaps someone is intentionally stirring up the masses to rebel against you, or perhaps it is the influence of the warp. Enforcers are already investigating, but right now we need to stop the conflict from escalating any further — as long as the unrest continues, the voidship's shields will not be operating at full capacity."
languages.original_text: "Слухи о присутствии на корабле Лорд-капитана Теодоры ходят давно и напоминают скорее провокацию, чем болтовню обычных пьяниц. Возможно, кто-то намеренно возбуждает массы восстать против вас, или же это влияние варпа. Блюстители уже проводит расследование, но прямо сейчас нужно остановить разгорающийся конфликт — пока волнения продолжаются, щиты корабля не будут работать в полную мощность".

traits.locale_text: "Rumors of Lady Theodora's presence on the voidship have been around for a long time and resemble a provocation rather than the chatter of ordinary drunkards. Perhaps someone is intentionally stirring up the masses to rebel against you, or it is the influence of the warp. Enforcers are already investigating, but right now we need to stop the further escalation of the conflict — as long as the unrest continues, the voidship's shields will not work at full capacity."

languages.text: “关于西奥多拉夫人出现在虚空舰上的谣言已经流传了很久。这恐怕并不只是某个人酒后胡言乱语，更像是某种有意为之的挑衅行为。或许是某些人打算教唆船员发动叛乱，也有可能是由于亚空间的影响。执法者已经在调查这件事情了，但目前，我们需要阻止冲突进一步升级。只要骚乱继续蔓延，虚空舰的护盾就无法满负荷运行。”
languages.original_text: "Rumours of Lady Theodora's presence on the voidship have been circulating for a long time and appear to be a deliberate provocation rather than ordinary drunken ramblings. Perhaps someone is intentionally stirring up the masses to rebel against you, or perhaps it is the influence of the warp. Enforcers are already investigating, but right now we need to stop the conflict from escalating any further — as long as the unrest continues, the voidship's shields will not be operating at full capacity."

traits.locale_text: “关于西奥多拉夫人出现在虚空舰上的谣言已经流传了很久。这恐怕并不只是某个人酒后胡言乱语，更像是某种有意为之的挑衅行为。或许是某些人打算教唆船员发动叛乱，也有可能是由于亚空间的影响。镇压者已经在调查这件事情了，但目前，我们需要阻止冲突进一步升级。只要骚乱继续蔓延，虚空舰的护盾就无法满负荷运行。”

languages.text: «Los rumores de la presencia de lady Theodora a bordo de la nave llevan circulando mucho tiempo. Parecen ser un esfuerzo intencionado y no los desvaríos de un borracho. Es posible que alguien instigue a las masas a rebelarse contra usted, o podría ser el influjo de la disformidad. Seguridad ya está investigando, pero lo esencial es evitar que el conflicto empeore cuanto antes. Mientras los disturbios continúen, los escudos de la nave del vacío no operarán a plena potencia».
languages.original_text: "Rumours of Lady Theodora's presence on the voidship have been circulating for a long time and appear to be a deliberate provocation rather than ordinary drunken ramblings. Perhaps someone is intentionally stirring up the masses to rebel against you, or perhaps it is the influence of the warp. Enforcers are already investigating, but right now we need to stop the conflict from escalating any further — as long as the unrest continues, the voidship's shields will not be operating at full capacity."

traits.locale_text: «Los rumores de la presencia de lady Theodora a bordo de la nave llevan circulando mucho tiempo. Parecen ser un esfuerzo intencionado y no los desvaríos de un borracho. Es posible que alguien instigue a las masas a rebelarse contra usted, o podría ser el influjo de la disformidad. Seguridad ya está investigando, pero lo esencial es evitar que el conflicto empeore cuanto antes. Mientras los disturbios continúen, los escudos de la nave del vacío no operarán a plena potencia».

languages.text: "Gerüchte über Lady Theodoras Gegenwart auf dem Raumschiff kursieren schon sehr lange und scheinen eher eine gezielte Provokation als das Geschwätz von Betrunkenen zu sein. Möglicherweise hetzt jemand die Massen gegen Euch auf. Es könnte aber auch der Einfluss des Warps sein. Unsere Enforcer gehen der Sache bereits nach, aber jetzt gilt es erst einmal, eine weitere Eskalation des Konfliktes zu verhindern ... solange die Unruhen andauern, arbeiten die Schilde des Raumschiffs nämlich nicht mit voller Kapazität."
languages.original_text: "Rumours of Lady Theodora's presence on the voidship have been circulating for a long time and appear to be a deliberate provocation rather than ordinary drunken ramblings. Perhaps someone is intentionally stirring up the masses to rebel against you, or perhaps it is the influence of the warp. Enforcers are already investigating, but right now we need to stop the conflict from escalating any further — as long as the unrest continues, the voidship's shields will not be operating at full capacity."

traits.locale_text: "Rumours of Lady Theodora's presence on the voidship have been circulating for a long time and appear to be a deliberate provocation rather than ordinary drunken ramblings. Perhaps someone is intentionally stirring up the masses to rebel against you, or perhaps it is the influence of the warp. Enforcers are already investigating, but right now we need to stop the conflict from escalating any further — as long as the unrest continues, the voidship's shields will not be operating at full capacity."

languages.text: « Des rumeurs faisant état de la présence de dame Théodora à bord du vaisseau spatial circulent depuis un certain temps déjà. Elles semblent être le fruit d'une provocation délibérée, plutôt que de simples divagations d'ivrognes. Quelqu'un cherche peut-être à pousser l'équipage à se rebeller contre vous, à moins que tout cela ne soit dû à l'influence du Warp. Les prévôts mènent déjà l'enquête, mais il nous faut pour l'instant empêcher que le conflit ne s'aggrave... Tant que ces troubles perdureront, les boucliers du vaisseau ne fonctionneront pas à leur pleine capacité. »
languages.original_text: "Rumours of Lady Theodora's presence on the voidship have been circulating for a long time and appear to be a deliberate provocation rather than ordinary drunken ramblings. Perhaps someone is intentionally stirring up the masses to rebel against you, or perhaps it is the influence of the warp. Enforcers are already investigating, but right now we need to stop the conflict from escalating any further — as long as the unrest continues, the voidship's shields will not be operating at full capacity."

traits.locale_text: « Des rumeurs faisant état de la présence de dame Théodora à bord du vaisseau spatial circulent depuis un certain temps déjà. Tant que ces troubles perdureront, les boucliers du vaisseau ne fonctionneront pas à leur pleine capacité. »

languages.text: 「ヴォイドシップにシオドーラ様が現れるという噂がずっと駆け巡っているのですが、そこら辺の酔っ払いの戯れ言ではなく、わざと事を荒立てようとしているようです。もしかしたら、何者かが意図的に大衆を煽ってあなたへ反乱を起こそうとしているのか、はたまた歪みの影響のせいかもしれませんね。エンフォーサーがすでに調査中ですが、今は争いがこれ以上の大ごとに発展するのを阻止しなければいけません。騒動が続く限り、ヴォイドシップのシールドが能力を発揮しきれませんよ」
languages.original_text: "Rumours of Lady Theodora's presence on the voidship have been circulating for a long time and appear to be a deliberate provocation rather than ordinary drunken ramblings. Perhaps someone is intentionally stirring up the masses to rebel against you, or perhaps it is the influence of the warp. Enforcers are already investigating, but right now we need to stop the conflict from escalating any further — as long as the unrest continues, the voidship's shields will not be operating at full capacity."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴォイドシップにシオドーラ様が現れるという噂がずっと駆け巡っているのですが、そこら辺の酔っ払いの戯れ言ではなく、わざと事を荒立てようとしているようです。もしかしたら、何者かが意図的に大衆を煽ってあなたへ反乱を起こそうとしているのか、はたまた歪みの影響のせいかもしれませんね。エンフォーサーがすでに調査中ですが、今は争いがこれ以上の大ごとに発展するのを阻止しなければいけません。騒動が続く限り、ヴォイドシップのシールドが能力を発揮しきれませんよ」

languages.text: "Leydi Theodora'nın uçsuz gemisinde bulunduğuna dair söylentiler uzunca bir süredir gündemde ve sarhoş birilerinin sıradan saçmalamalarından ziyade kasıtlı bir provokasyona benziyor. Belki de birileri, size karşı ayaklanmaları için kitleleri kışkırtıyordur. Belki de öteboyutun etkisidir. İnfazcılar durumu incelemeye başladı ancak şu an için çatışmanın daha da büyümesinin önüne geçmeliyiz. Huzursuzluk devam ettikçe uçsuz gemisinin kalkanları tam kapasite çalışmayacak."
languages.original_text: "Rumours of Lady Theodora's presence on the voidship have been circulating for a long time and appear to be a deliberate provocation rather than ordinary drunken ramblings. Perhaps someone is intentionally stirring up the masses to rebel against you, or perhaps it is the influence of the warp. Enforcers are already investigating, but right now we need to stop the conflict from escalating any further — as long as the unrest continues, the voidship's shields will not be operating at full capacity."
